name: A Sea View, with Exit Wounds
name_original: A Sea View, with Exit Wounds
description:
A Sea View, with Exit Wounds is a short story by Maxamillian John.

Emma returns to her family home in a seaside town after hearing that the father who abandoned her and her mother has died.

It will take about thirty minutes to read and cannot be viewed on mobile phones.

You can find me on Twitter @maxltj, or at my website.
